title: Spyder Auto Installation: 2012-14 Ford Focus Projector Headlights with LED DRLs
description:
This video demonstrates how to install a set of Spyder Auto's projector LED light bar headlights on any 2012-14 Ford Focus. This complete walkthrough guides you through the entire install process from start to finish and offers helpful tips throughout to facilitate a successful installation.

These headlights are available in your choice of black or chrome housings.
tags: Spyder Projector Headlights, Ford Focus, how to install spyder lights, LED headlights Spyder
